If you want: a game that you will spend hours playing, a game that you can practice for hours and have that all ruined by someone else's luck, a game where your team mates won't say a word until you mess up then they proceed to scream down their mics at you. Then I can tell you that this is the game for you.

Fun game, big learning curve when it comes to other games I have played. Very team oriented and communication is a must. I mostly play R6 but when I started playing CSGO I found that I enjoy it the same even though the games are very different.
Spent too much time on this game, definetly worth it tho

Bom, esse jogo é divertido e tudo mais, tem bons graficos, jogabilidade boa, bons mapas, boas skins, etc
porém oq estraga ele é a comunidade e acaba ficando muito chato vc jogar pelo fato de toda vez q vc entrar em uma partida no casual os caras vão ser toxicos, se a comunidade fosse um pouco menos toxica acho q seria um bom jogo de se jogar
